key_items: The "man wearing red shirt and glasses" is directly observable and serves as a reference point for scene continuity. His presence or absence in subsequent frames can help determine if a scene transition has occurred. The "text 'SAMSUNG 2016'" is another static element that can be used to track scene changes. If this text appears or disappears in different frames,it could indicate a scene transition.[Verification criteria

The presence of the "man wearing red shirt and glasses" in each frame can help confirm if a scene transition has occurred. If he is consistently present,it suggests no transition; if he appears or disappears,it indicates a transition. The "text 'SAMSUNG 2016'" serves a similar purpose. Its consistent appearance or disappearance across frames can signal a scene transition.
